children.description: Content of badge (text or custom node).

label.description: Text content of badge (if children is not provided).

icon.description: MDI icon name, renders internal Icon component.

colorScheme.description: Color scheme of badge (primary, success, danger, warning, info).

borderRadius.description: Predefined border radius (xs, sm, md, lg, full).

size.description: Badge size token (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

hidden.description: If true, badge will not be rendered.

noPrint.description: Hides badge when printing (adds no-print className).

children.description: Content rendered inside the button (text, icons, custom nodes).

disabled.description: Prevents interaction and visually disables the button.

loading.description: Alias for pending state â€“ indicates that an async action is running.

colorScheme.description: Determines visual look of the button based on predefined color palette (primary, success, dangerâ€¦).

significance.description: Controls visual intensity of the button: common (default), highlighted, distinct.

icon.description: Name of mdi icon rendered inside the button.

iconPosition.description: Controls whether icon is rendered on the left or right side of the content.

label.description: Simple text alternative to children â€“ useful for easy text buttons or accessibility.

onClick.description: Triggered when the user clicks the button.

className.description: Additional CSS class names applied to the root button element.

borderRadius.description: Predefined border radius token (xs, sm, md, lg, full).

size.description: Button size token (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

removeDefaultStyle.description: Disables built-in styling and leaves only raw button element for full customization.

tooltip.description: Browser default tooltip shown when hovering over the button.

darkMode.description: Renders the button using dark mode palette (affects colorScheme behavior).

isPending.description: Shows loading spinner and blocks interactions. Content becomes visually hidden.

noPrint.description: Hides the button when printing (adds no-print class).

icon.description: Name of the Material Design Icon (mdi-*) to render.

size.description: Icon size token (xs, sm, md, lg, xl) or number (em) for custom size.

className.description: Additional class names for the wrapper span.

onClick.description: Click handler for the icon wrapper.

hidden.description: If true, the icon is not rendered.

label.description: Optional text label displayed next to the icon.

darkMode.description: Use dark mode palette when true.

className.description: Additional CSS class names for the SVG element.

type.description: Spinner style: circular or horizontal bar.

size.description: Pending size token (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).

darkMode.description: Use dark mode palette when true.

logo.description: Content rendered in the left section; string or custom node.

centerContent.description: Content placed in the centered section of the navbar.

rightContent.description: Content placed in the right section (e.g., actions).

onLogoClick.description: Callback fired when the logo is clicked.

removeDefaultStyle.description: Disables built-in styling for container, logo, and buttons.

colorScheme.description: Background and text colors based on theme palette.

darkMode.description: Use dark mode palette when true.

sticky.description: If true, navbar will stick to the top when scrolling.

onHamburgerClick.description: Callback fired when the hamburger menu button is clicked.

showHamburger.description: Manually control hamburger menu visibility. If not provided, automatically shows on mobile (< 768px).

hamburgerOpen.description: Controls the open/closed state of the hamburger menu (affects icon: menu/close).

mobileBreakpoint.description: Breakpoint in pixels for mobile detection (default: 768).

itemList.description: Top-level items to render in the sidebar (can be nested).

className.description: Additional class names for the container.

removeDefaultStyle.description: Disables built-in container and item styling.

tooltip.description: Optional tooltip on the container (native title).

label.description: Optional label text for the container.

onItemClick.description: Callback when an item is clicked; receives item and event.

colorScheme.description: Background and text colors based on theme palette.

darkMode.description: Use dark mode palette when true.

mobileMode.description: Activates mobile mode with overlay and fixed positioning.

isOpen.description: Controls the open/closed state of the sidebar in mobile mode.

onClose.description: Callback fired when the sidebar should close (e.g., overlay click or item click).

navbarHeight.description: Height of the navbar for proper positioning in mobile mode (default: 64).

card.description: Card type: none (no shadow), full (shadow around whole component), content (shadow only around content and footer).

ActionList.description: Array of components displayed in the top right corner.

header.description: Text or component displayed in the top left corner.

headerSeparator.description: Shows separator line between header and content.

info.description: If provided, shows info icon with popover on click.

collapsible.description: Makes content collapsible with toggle button in header.

height.description: Height of the component (string or number).

minHeight.description: Minimum height of the component (string or number).

maxHeight.description: Maximum height of the component (string or number).

borderRadius.description: Border radius token (xs, sm, md, lg, full).

significance.description: Visual significance: common, highlighted, distinct, subdued.

maxWidth.description: Maximum width of the component (string or number).

hidden.description: If true, component is not rendered.

wholeLengthNumberInTooltip.description: Show the full number in the tooltip.

minDecimalDigits.description: The minimum number of decimal digits.

auth.errorGeneric: An error occurred during sign in

placeholder.description: Placeholder text displayed in the input field.

value.description: The value of the input field.

label.description: Label text displayed above the input.

onChange.description: Called when the input value changes.

onBlur.description: Called when the input loses focus.

onFocus.description: Called when the input gains focus.

type.description: HTML input type (text, email, password, etc.).

basicComponentsPage.title: Basic Components Library
basicComponentsPage.description: This is a library of simple, reusable UI components. Here you can find detailed information about all available basic components.
basicComponentsPage.instructions: To view documentation for a specific component, expand the Basic Components section in the left menu and select the component you're interested in.

utilitiesPage.title: Tools and Utilities
utilitiesPage.description: A collection of helpful tools and utilities for your projects.
utilitiesPage.instructions: Select a tool from the left menu to view its documentation.

copyToClipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard
copyToClipboard.description: Utility function for copying text to clipboard using navigator.clipboard API with fallback for older browsers.

text.name: text
text.description: The text to be copied to the clipboard.

returnValue.description: Returns Promise<boolean> - true if copying was successful, false otherwise.

basic.title: Basic usage

withErrorHandling.title: With error handling

getMostFrequentValue.title: Get Most Frequent Value
getMostFrequentValue.description: Utility function that returns the most frequent value in an array. You can also pass a key to analyze objects.

errors.invalidInput: Input must be a comma-separated list or a JSON array.
errors.invalidKey: Key not found in objects. Provide valid objects or leave key empty.

arr.name: arr
arr.description: Array of values or objects to analyze.

key.name: key
key.description: Object key to analyze. Use empty string to analyze array values directly.

caseSensitive.name: caseSensitive
caseSensitive.description: When false, values are compared case-insensitively.

returnValue.description: Returns Promise<any | null> - the most frequent value or null for an empty array.

basic.title: Basic usage

withObjects.title: With objects

about.title: About
about.description: This is a React TypeScript UI component library demo application. It showcases various reusable UI components that can be used in your projects.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Built with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. All components are designed to be accessible, customizable, and easy to use.
